features: The ultra-high performance, all-season tire choice for drivers seeking true, year-round traction; All new Sport Plus Technology provides precise handling; security on wet, slippery roads; and excellent tread life
Quick View Indicators visually inform drivers to the level tires are performing in dry, wet and snow and the need to check vehicle’s alignment
Traction Grooves improve snow performance through increased pattern edges, while X-Sipe technology improves braking, cornering and acceleration in wet, snow and ice
This product is not for sale in the state of Arkansas
body.description: For over 100 years, Pirelli Tire has provided discerning drivers with an impressive line of some of the world's best tires.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pirelli Tires: 150 Years of Excellence Founded in Milan, Italy, in 1872, Pirelli has 150 years of experience making excellent tires for every application. Having a presence in over 350 motorsport competitions worldwide and being the Global Tire Partner of Formula 1, Pirelli’s excellence in motorsports and technology directly benefits everyday consumers. Pirelli tires can be found on everyday coupes, sedans, CUVs, SUVs, minivans, and pickup trucks, in addition to motorcycles and bicycles. To commemorate their 150th anniversary, Pirelli has created a year-long celebration that includes a worldwide countdown, a play, an advert, a coin, a stamp, a special issue of World magazine, a 3D website implementing the latest digital innovations, and the publication of a book. As one of the top companies in the world, Pirelli continues to focus heavily on sustainability as a core value integrated into the engineering of all of their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered fast! A great price and a great tire!!!
reviews.reviewText: Im so happy with my Pirrelli Scorpions!!! They look like a million bucks and road noise is much better than my BFGoodrich All terrain tires.If you can order your tires online and take them to be installed you’ll save a ton of money! It’s easy to do! You can do it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value, excellent product my daughter loves her new tires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect SUV tire
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality tire for the price. No road noise, long mileage warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very smooth...installer deal not worth the hassle
reviews.reviewText: The tires are a great buy, and very smooth ride on my Honda Passport. The installer offer didn't work at all (installer got the tires but lost them and my appointment). Ended up getting a refund and replacement shipped to my house, and spent $100 at my local trusted tire guys. Much easier that way, IMHO since you usually can get them on within a day of receiving them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice tires fast shipping
reviews.reviewText: Bough for my truck. Price was good and shipping was fast. Tread does not match the photo tho may be an older stock photo? My truck has staggered wheels and these have more of an "agressive" look from the side than what I wanted. Description needs a photo may differ from actual item disclaimer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tires right price
reviews.reviewText: The tires were put on the same day they arrived, and performed great look great, and had a much better price than every competitor out there, including discount, tire, Walmart, and archive tires. This really was a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great tires ordered and delivered to my doorstep for half the price of the local tireshops. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All four seem good
reviews.reviewText: Bought four tires for my Edge. They are the exact same tires and threads as what was on the vehicle. Smooth and quiet. Also went with the Pep Boys installation service one can purchase at the same time, although I couldn’t get it to work at purchase so I ordered the tires and called my local Pep Boys and scheduled the install. When one is able to purchase it at the time of sale, the tires are supposed to be shipped directly to Pep Boys. Didn’t happen in my case. No big deal. As far as Pep Boys go, they were fantastic. Took the car right in and a couple hours later, I was on my way. The Mrs Honda will need tires in the Fall and as this was so successful, I’ll do it the same way. Prior to this I always bought tire from Town Fair. A very good company to deal with, but this transaction worked out seamlessly. I even saved almost 200 bucks this way.
